desc: 攻撃力・最大ＨＰを１５％アップ

dictionary.lore: A sword that is said only to be given to those who are deemed worthy by the Dragon King. With a blade as sharp as the fang of the Dragon King himself, it is believed to be wielded with the goal of eradicating whatever damage has been done to nature. It is still unclear as to whether this sword of legend was really seen by anyone, whether it was part of the god army, or whether it was owned by a hero who defied the deities during the battle against the gods.
